website_summaries.verdict: If you care about how your devices look, then the questionable aesthetics of the Vervebuds 200 will be a problem. Get past that though and you have a reasonably priced pair of true wireless earbuds that deliver good sound and work well with video content. Call quality is a problem, as the audio doesn’t really pass muster, but for running, at the gym or just general everyday use the Vervebuds 200 have much to offer.
pros: safe to wear in the rain

customer_reviews.title: Could  amazon replace it .
customer_reviews.text: I lost my r side ear bud ,kept falling out so disappointing I need to replace it ,could amazon replace it .
customer_reviews.author: ktdt

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect item, great sound. Extra buds allow a better fit in both ears. I would happily buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: MrsY

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds  sound good, microphone disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The sound in overall are pretty good, designed verry well, but I'm verry disappointed in microphone which are rubbish ,it's practical impossible to have a conversation into phone call. Motorola shame on you ,could be much better,so just a 3 star for the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Groza

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: i bought two set's, good sound etc. but have had more comfortable one's,
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rushton

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth connectivity ever....
customer_reviews.text: The connectivity, sound quality, battery life, quality of the product is amazing....the only downside is the size , it's a bit big....
customer_reviews.author: G M K 29

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound quality and good value compared to others I've tried
customer_reviews.author: Russ Monie

customer_reviews.title: great product, and easy to use.😀
customer_reviews.text: I work all day, and use it to listen to music and talk to family.
customer_reviews.author: Ester A Feŕreira

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve not come across Motorola previously as a maker of headphones or earphones, but these buds are pretty good. They seem well-made, fit my ears well, and have a reasonable charge life when used with the charging case. The sound quality isn’t bad at all; it doesn’t quite have the range or the depth of more expensive buds, but is clear and sharp, and has reasonable bass. I like these a lot.
customer_reviews.author: ArtichokesForAll

customer_reviews.title: Volume cap
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and they were great but now after many connections to my phone they seem to have a cap on the volume, it appears as max and other headphones are fine but they can now only go so loud. (Not enough)
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: If Apple Ear Buds are too expensive and you’re looking for a cheaper alternative then don’t get these. Although the design is good with a cool charging case that doubles up as somewhere to store them, and the buds themselves look ok when wearing them, they have really tinny sound with hardly any bass. It’s like listening to the radio on one of those old cheap stereos from the 90s. The buds also are not too secure in your ears. Walking is ok but anything more active like running or other fitness then forget it. I when for a short jog with these in and really thought I was going to lose one as they were constantly coming loose.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Evil

product_meta.title: Motorola VerveBuds 200 2-in-1 Wireless Sport Earbuds with Anti-Lost Neck Strap and Portable Charging Case – Black
product_meta.description: The Verve Buds 200 2-in-1 Wireless Sport Earbuds focus on what matters most – staying connect-ed on the move. These wire-free earbuds give you a light-weight, secure fit with rich stereo sound, so you can listen with no distractions. Created with waterproof protection and designed to work with any smartphone, tablet or computer, they give you the freedom of listening anytime, anywhere, rain or shine. Stay connected all day with up to 10 hours of playtime and charge them anywhere using the portable charging case (included). For those who want added security, trans-form your wearing style to a loop-style headset by attaching the lanyard (included) to the earbuds. Go hands-free with the built-in mic and receive full support from the compatible voice assistants Siri, Google Now and Alexa. The Verve Buds 200. Wireless Music Simplified. VERVEBUDS 2002-in-1 Wireless Sport Earbuds Unlock 70, 000+ Alexa skills with Hubble Connected Up to 10hrs of playtime110hWaterproof2IPX5Rich stereo sound.
feature_bullets: Up to 10 hours playtime with charging case (3 hours per charge)
Voice assistant compatible (works with Alexa, Siri and Google Assistant)
